UtAsCharMatcher
UtMatcher
UtAsCharMatcher

Operates only on string values (not on matchers).

Globals
Functions
ut as char
ut as char(
string value 
)

Compares the given string to the actual value converted to character.

Factory function for UtAsCharMatcher.

Arguments
value
string

should be a string

Examples
ut assert that( Expr( [1] || [1] ), ut as char( "[1 1]" ) )
